snippet: Mohamed Osman Mohamud is accused of plotting and trying to carry out a bomb attack at a Christmas tree lighting ceremony in a crowded Portland, Ore. square.
abstract: Federal trial begins for Mohamed Osman Mohamud, Somali-American accused of trying to carry out bomb attack in Portland, Ore, in November 2010; defense lawyers do not deny  Mohamud intended to detonate bomb, but argue incident was due to manipulation by undercover Federal Bureau of Investigation agents, not defendant's violent religious extremism.
lead_paragraph: Mohamed Osman Mohamud is accused of plotting and trying to carry out a bomb attack at a Christmas tree lighting ceremony in a crowded Portland, Ore. square.

headline.seo: Trial Begins for Mohamed Osman Mohamud
headline.main: In 2010 Portland Bomb Plot, a Question of Manipulation or Violent Extremism
headline.print_headline: In 2010 Portland Bomb Plot, a Question of Manipulation or Violent Extremism
